bug.short_desc: Data->ListController: selection seems wrong when multi select done in reverse order

long_desc.thetext: Could you be a little bit more precise about your description?

This is Demo Browser application. Demo path: Demos->data->ListController.
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/#data~ListController.html
If I select "Item 1, Item 2, Item 3" in first list - I see correct selection: "Item 1, Item 2, Item 3".
But if I select "Item 3, Item 2, Item 1" selection is "Item 3, Item 3, Item 3"
Look's like it's browser specific. I use Chromium 11.0.696.71 (86024) Ubuntu 11.04, and Firefox 4.0.1.
Problem appeared with Chromium.

Ah now I get it. Thanks for the details. Could you check the current trunk version: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/demobrowser/#data~ListController.html
Seems like it is already fixed with bug #4728.

Yes, problem fixed in dev version.
I will be more accurate in future and check dev version too before posting here. Sorry for duplicate...

(In reply to comment #4) > Yes, problem fixed in dev version. > > I will be more accurate in future and check dev version too before posting > here. Sorry for duplicate...
No problem. We better have the same bug twice than not having it at all. :)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 4728 ***
